Description:
Required Skills to be successful:Job-Specific Technical Skills:Hands-on experience in installation/construction activities and worked in a construction environment.
Hands-on experience in commissioning various ICT/ELV/AV systems.
Technical training/certifications on leading ICT/ELV/AV System.
Expert knowledge of ICT/ELV/AV industry standards, practices, techniques, procedures, codes and regulations.
Knowledge of QS & QC processes.
Should have good knowledge of networks, Installation, T&C & ICT/ELV/AV system integration.
Experience in basic network implementation, installation, configuration and troubleshooting is necessary.
Basic knowledge in AutoCAD.
Responsive to changing demands.
Experience in construction management
Good knowledge of Project execution processes
Good knowledge of local code of practice and International Standards for design implementation Behavioural Competencies:Excellent communication skills for interfacing with internal and external stakeholders.
Excellent problem-solving skills
Excellent interpersonal skills
Teamwork
Job Ethic
Meeting standard
Commitment to job
Attitude towards honesty
Client Relationship Management.
Excellent time management.
Relies on extensive experience and judgment to accomplish goals.
Detail-oriented and strong analytical skills.
Strong organizational skills and ability to plan and schedule work. What equips you for the roleMinimum Qualifications and Knowledge: Bachelor's degree in a technical field (IT/Communication/Electricals/Engineering/Similar).
PMP certification Minimum Experience:7 to 10 years relevant work experience in ICT/ELV project implementation, including Structured cabling, ICT, ELV, Security, AV, etcJob Details
